DOC.brief_summary: The goal project test feasibility , acceptability , efficacy treatment module address mental health functional impact kill war zone . The investigator enroll 12-20 Veterans kill war diagnose post-traumatic stress disorder ( PTSD ) pilot study assess efficacy six-session treatment . Veterans randomize either treatment waitlist control group .
DOC.brief_title: Treatment Mental Health Impact Killing War
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis PTSD Veteran need endorse take another life war zone context Have receive prior evidencebased treatment PTSD Meet current lifetime criterion psychotic disorder Participants current PTSD treatment exclude ; however , receive medication need stabilize current medication least one month . If receive Prolonged Exposure Therapy Cognitive Behavioral Therapy , individual need wait two week complete treatment enroll study .
